title: DDI-CDI Provenance Activity
description: DDI-CDI native provenance activity. Describes workflows using cdi:Activity, cdi:Step, cdi:ProcessingAgent, and cdi:Parameter vocabulary.

cdi:description.description: Plain text description of the activity

cdi:language.description: ISO language code (e.g. en, fr, de)
ISO language code (e.g. en, fr, de)

cdi:entityUsed.description: Entities used as inputs by this activity

cdi:entityProduced.description: Entities produced as outputs by this activity
